meanings: in vain, uselessly, needlessly, fruitlessly, pointlessly, gratuitously, without reason[ground], for nothing, to no purpose
fight for no reason at all
tell a lie gratuitously[to no purpose]

examples.korean: I've always followed my father's advice: he told me, first to always keep my word and, second, to never insult anybody unintentionally.
